data.title: Isabella Marie Leong
data.meta_description: Projektleder at Department of Agroecology - Staff, AGRO Foulum at Aarhus University. See job responsibilities and contact information.
data.text: My role blends strategic planning with hands-on execution to drive impactful projects from conception to completion. I am proficient in the funding landscape related to the research sector and enjoy forging partnerships with stakeholders ranging from governmental bodies to private companies. Through effective communication and leadership, I foster collaboration among multicultural teams, maximizing efficiency and driving results.
